subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Daniel Brière, co-captain of the Buffalo Sabres, scored two goals to lead the Sabres to a victory over the Carolina Hurricanes in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: Daniel Brière, co-captain of the Buffalo Sabres, scored two goals to lead the Sabres to a victory over the Carolina Hurricanes in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals.
